name: Business Traveler Social
tag_list: business-travel, travel, social-travel, mobile-app, app, networking
overview:
BTSocial is a social networking and information resource for business travelers. BTSocial is a tool for business travelers to connect with one another, both online at BTSocial.com and app.BTSocial.com, and in-person. BTSocial is the first business-travel-centric service featuring an interactive social application for users to share locations, comprehensive news platform, and social networking events.

BTSocial’s mission is to provide its members with a superior travel experience, while supplying them with a social outlet to interact with people in their unique world. BTSocial is truly the Business Traveler’s Social Meeting Place™.

The BTSocial Travel App, now available on the web and mobile web is accessible at app.btsocial.com. The app serves as a tool to connect business travelers in person during their trips by sharing their locations. Travelers can Check-In to any location around the world, plan Socials to mingle with other travelers and share where they will be stopped on their upcoming Trips. The app is currently in beta release and will be undergoing many updates to keep travelers engaged. The app will also soon be available for download on the Android, Blackberry and Apple platforms.
